casebody.data:
MOORE
v.
NATIONWIDE INSURANCE. No. 330A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 29, 2008. Robert O. Crawford, III, Aaron C. Hemmings, Raleigh, for Moore. George L. Simpson, III, Raleigh, for Nationwide. Jerome P. Trehy, Jr., Raleigh, Jesse H. Rigsby, IV, for NCATL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of September 2008 by Asso. of Defense Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of September 2008."
